com.solacesystems.ubersol

Interface CLIExecutor

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CLIExecutorImpl

    public interface CLIExecutor
    Provides creation and caching of SFTP connections to various Solace appliances and methods to execute ftp commands on those sessions. Typically, one would use this tool as part of scripting rollouts across multiple appliances at a time. All methods EXCEPT the connect() method take a 'glob-expression' of connections the command is expected to execute over. For example, if the SftpExecutor currently has 3 sessions open with names { fred, sally, sherman }, then the following upload cmd will be executed on { sally, sherman } due to glob-matching: put("s*", "soltr_7.0.0.1078.tar.gz", "loads/"); NOTE: this is glob-matching, NOT regex matching.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Response connect(String connectionName, String ipAndPort, String user, String password)
      Creates a CLI session via SSH and caches the session mapped to a connectionName string.
      Map<String,Response> disconnect(String connExpr)
      Disconnects all CLI sessions with names connExpr matches via globbing and removes them from the session cache.
      Map<String,Response> execute(String connExpr, String command)
      Executes an ad hoc Solace CLI command on all session with names connExpr matches via globbing.
      Map<String,Response> executeScript(String connExpr, String scriptFileName)
      Reads CLI commands from a local script file, executing them over all sessions with names matched against connExpr via globbing.
      List<String> listSessions()
      Returns the list of all CLI session names currently cached.

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        Response connect(String connectionName,
                 String ipAndPort,
                 String user,
                 String password)
        Creates a CLI session via SSH and caches the session mapped to a connectionName string.
        Parameters:
        connectionName - Name (NOT a wildcard expression) assigned to this session for retrieval in disconnect, execute, and executeScript commands.
        ipAndPort - The IP:port to connect to. If no port is provided, port 22 is assumed.
        user - Username to authenticate with.
        password - Password to authenticate with username.
        Returns:
        The connection status and initial text output from the session upon connection.
        See Also:
        Response

      • disconnect

        Map<String,Response> disconnect(String connExpr)
        Disconnects all CLI sessions with names connExpr matches via globbing and removes them from the session cache.
        Parameters:
        connExpr - A glob-expression intended to match 1 or more cached sessions for disconnection.
        Returns:
        List of disconnection status and output for each matched connection.
        See Also:
        Response

      • listSessions

        List<String> listSessions()
        Returns the list of all CLI session names currently cached.
        Returns:
        names of all cached CLI sessions.

      • execute

        Map<String,Response> execute(String connExpr,
                             String command)
        Executes an ad hoc Solace CLI command on all session with names connExpr matches via globbing.
        Parameters:
        connExpr - A glob-expression intended to match 1 or more cached sessions for command execution.
        command - Ad hoc Solace CLI statement; this is passed directly to the attached Solace session without validaton.
        Returns:
        List of execution status and output for each matched connection.
        See Also:
        Response

      • executeScript

        Map<String,Response> executeScript(String connExpr,
                                   String scriptFileName)
        Reads CLI commands from a local script file, executing them over all sessions with names matched against connExpr via globbing.
        Parameters:
        connExpr - A glob-expression intended to match 1 or more cached sessions for disconnection.
        scriptFileName - Path to local file containing Solace CLI commands; these commands are not validated before execution on all matching sessions.
        Returns:
        List of script-execution status and output for each matched connection.
        See Also:
        Response
